reviewText: I never realized how much the Tammany Hall American experience of a corrupt political administration co-operating with organized crime so closely resembles our current administration on so many levels of criminality. Of course, we never learn from our mistakes. We appear doomed to re-create these experiments on even grander scale time after time.
The video was informative, though not specific or graphic enough to provide a realistic view of street gangs.

This video is an excellent way to get a grasp of the gang mentality that most people in the United States will never understand.  There are more examples of the common "thug life" thread than any series I have seen.  This can be used for individual or group viewing, and has many excellent opportunities for discussion built in.
